content: Stumpf walked away from this with a lot more than $75 million. He should be made to return all of it. He and Tolstedt should have been charged with crimes and put on trial. They weren't. Former Attorney General, Kamala Harris, settled this case, as she did with all other cases, with no prosecutions.Will any of these bankers ever go to jail? What crimes must they commit for prosecutors to finally bring them to justice?---www.rimaregas.com
